searching for Search for Items
section.para: To search for Items in Inventory, select the "Search for Items" option. The following screen will appear:

At the top of the screen is a "Search for" field. To search for an Item, enter any character or combination of characters you want to match. Apply any of the following filters when searching for Items. Hitting the TAB key activates the search operation.

tip.para: The "Search for" field supports pattern matching with Regular Expressions. For more information on matching patterns using Regular Expressions, see the .

listitem.para: Select to search through Item Numbers.
Select to search through first-line Item descriptions. The Item master provides two separate lines for describing an Item.
Select to search through second-line Item descriptions. The Item master provides two separate lines for describing an Item.
Select to show inactive Items as well as active Items, using the parameters specified above. By default, inactive Items are not displayed.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen, returning you to the application desktop.

Enables you to edit highlighted Items. The edit screen is the same as that for creating a new Item--except that when editing, the fields will contain Item information. Double-clicking on an Item will also bring you to the editing screen.
Highlight an Item and then select this button to reach a read-only view of the "Edit" screen.
